title.description: Full title by which the Dataset is known.
title.title: Title

subtitle.description: A secondary title used to amplify or state certain limitations on the main title.
subtitle.title: Subtitle

alternativeTitle.description: A title by which the work is commonly referred, or an abbreviation of the title.
alternativeTitle.title: Alternative Title

otherId.description: Another unique identifier that identifies this Dataset (e.g., producer's or another repository's number).
otherId.title: Other ID

otherIdAgency.description: Name of agency which generated this identifier.
otherIdAgency.title: Agency

otherIdValue.description: Other identifier that corresponds to this Dataset.
otherIdValue.title: Identifier

author.description: The person(s), corporate body(ies), or agency(ies) responsible for creating the work.
author.title: Author

authorName.description: The author's Family Name, Given Name or the name of the organization responsible for this Dataset.
authorName.title: Name

authorAffiliation.description: The organization with which the author is affiliated.
authorAffiliation.title: Affiliation

authorIdentifierScheme.description: Name of the identifier scheme (ORCID, ISNI).
authorIdentifierScheme.title: Identifier Scheme

authorIdentifier.description: Uniquely identifies an individual author or organization, according to various schemes.
authorIdentifier.title: Identifier

datasetContactName.description: The contact's Family Name, Given Name or the name of the organization.
datasetContactName.title: Name

datasetContactAffiliation.description: The organization with which the contact is affiliated.
datasetContactAffiliation.title: Affiliation

datasetContactEmail.description: The e-mail address(es) of the contact(s) for the Dataset. This will not be displayed.
datasetContactEmail.title: E-mail

dsDescription.description: A summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the Dataset.
dsDescription.title: Description

dsDescriptionValue.description: A summary describing the purpose, nature, and scope of the Dataset.
dsDescriptionValue.title: Text

dsDescriptionDate.description: In cases where a Dataset contains more than one description (for example, one might be supplied by the data producer and another prepared by the data repository where the data are deposited), the date attribute is used to distinguish between the two descriptions. The date attribute follows the ISO convention of YYYY-MM-DD.
dsDescriptionDate.title: Date

subject.description: Domain-specific Subject Categories that are topically relevant to the Dataset.
subject.title: Subject

keyword.description: Key terms that describe important aspects of the Dataset.
keyword.title: Keyword

keywordValue.description: Key terms that describe important aspects of the Dataset. Can be used for building keyword indexes and for classification and retrieval purposes. A controlled vocabulary can be employed. The vocab attribute is provided for specification of the controlled vocabulary in use, such as LCSH, MeSH, or others. The vocabURI attribute specifies the location for the full controlled vocabulary.
keywordValue.title: Term

keywordVocabulary.description: For the specification of the keyword controlled vocabulary in use, such as LCSH, MeSH, or others.
keywordVocabulary.title: Vocabulary

keywordVocabularyURI.description: Keyword vocabulary URL points to the web presence that describes the keyword vocabulary, if appropriate. Enter an absolute URL where the keyword vocabulary web site is found, such as http://www.my.org.
keywordVocabularyURI.title: Vocabulary URL

topicClassification.description: The classification field indicates the broad important topic(s) and subjects that the data cover. Library of Congress subject terms may be used here.
topicClassification.title: Topic Classification

topicClassValue.description: Topic or Subject term that is relevant to this Dataset.
topicClassValue.title: Term

topicClassVocab.description: Provided for specification of the controlled vocabulary in use, e.g., LCSH, MeSH, etc.
topicClassVocab.title: Vocabulary

topicClassVocabURI.description: Specifies the URL location for the full controlled vocabulary.
topicClassVocabURI.title: Vocabulary URL

publication.description: Publications that use the data from this Dataset.
publication.title: Related Publication

publicationCitation.description: The full bibliographic citation for this related publication.
publicationCitation.title: Citation

publicationIDType.description: The type of digital identifier used for this publication (e.g., Digital Object Identifier (DOI)).
publicationIDType.title: ID Type

publicationIDNumber.description: The identifier for the selected ID type.
publicationIDNumber.title: ID Number

publicationURL.description: Link to the publication web page (e.g., journal article page, archive record page, or other).
publicationURL.title: URL

notesText.description: Additional important information about the Dataset.
notesText.title: Notes

producer.description: Person or organization with the financial or administrative responsibility over this Dataset
producer.title: Producer

producerAffiliation.description: The organization with which the producer is affiliated.
producerAffiliation.title: Affiliation

producerAbbreviation.description: The abbreviation by which the producer is commonly known. (ex. IQSS, ICPSR)
producerAbbreviation.title: Abbreviation

producerURL.description: Producer URL points to the producer's web presence, if appropriate. Enter an absolute URL where the producer's web site is found, such as http://www.my.org.
producerURL.title: URL

producerLogoURL.description: URL for the producer's logo, which points to this  producer's web-accessible logo image. Enter an absolute URL where the producer's logo image is found, such as http://www.my.org/images/logo.gif.
producerLogoURL.title: Logo URL

productionDate.description: Date when the data collection or other materials were produced (not distributed, published or archived).
productionDate.title: Production Date

productionPlace.description: The location where the data collection and any other related materials were produced.
productionPlace.title: Production Place

contributor.description: The organization or person responsible for either collecting, managing, or otherwise contributing in some form to the development of the resource.
contributor.title: Contributor

contributorType.description: The type of contributor of the  resource.
contributorType.title: Type

contributorName.description: The Family Name, Given Name or organization name of the contributor.
contributorName.title: Name

grantNumberValue.description: The grant or contract number of the project that  sponsored the effort.
grantNumberValue.title: Grant Number

distributor.description: The organization designated by the author or producer to generate copies of the particular work including any necessary editions or revisions.
distributor.title: Distributor

distributorAffiliation.description: The organization with which the distributor contact is affiliated.
distributorAffiliation.title: Affiliation

distributorAbbreviation.description: The abbreviation by which this distributor is commonly known (e.g., IQSS, ICPSR).
distributorAbbreviation.title: Abbreviation

distributorURL.description: Distributor URL points to the distributor's web presence, if appropriate. Enter an absolute URL where the distributor's web site is found, such as http://www.my.org.
distributorURL.title: URL

distributorLogoURL.description: URL of the distributor's logo, which points to this  distributor's web-accessible logo image. Enter an absolute URL where the distributor's logo image is found, such as http://www.my.org/images/logo.gif.
distributorLogoURL.title: Logo URL

distributionDate.description: Date that the work was made available for distribution/presentation.
distributionDate.title: Distribution Date

depositor.description: The person (Family Name, Given Name) or the name of the organization that deposited this Dataset to the repository.
depositor.title: Depositor

dateOfDeposit.description: Date that the Dataset was deposited into the repository.
dateOfDeposit.title: Deposit Date

timePeriodCovered.description: Time period to which the data refer. This item reflects the time period covered by the data, not the dates of coding or making documents machine-readable or the dates the data were collected. Also known as span.
timePeriodCovered.title: Time Period Covered

timePeriodCoveredStart.description: Start date which reflects the time period covered by the data, not the dates of coding or making documents machine-readable or the dates the data were collected.
timePeriodCoveredStart.title: Start

timePeriodCoveredEnd.description: End date which reflects the time period covered by the data, not the dates of coding or making documents machine-readable or the dates the data were collected.
timePeriodCoveredEnd.title: End

dateOfCollection.description: Contains the date(s) when the data were collected.
dateOfCollection.title: Date of Collection

dateOfCollectionStart.description: Date when the data collection started.
dateOfCollectionStart.title: Start

dateOfCollectionEnd.description: Date when the data collection ended.
dateOfCollectionEnd.title: End

kindOfData.description: Type of data included in the file: survey data, census/enumeration data, aggregate data, clinical data, event/transaction data, program source code, machine-readable text, administrative records data, experimental data, psychological test, textual data, coded textual, coded documents, time budget diaries, observation data/ratings, process-produced data, or other.
kindOfData.title: Kind of Data

software.description: Information about the software used to generate the Dataset.
software.title: Software

softwareName.description: Name of software used to generate the Dataset.
softwareName.title: Name

softwareVersion.description: Version of the software used to generate the Dataset.
softwareVersion.title: Version

relatedMaterial.description: Any material related to this Dataset.
relatedMaterial.title: Related Material

relatedDatasets.description: Any Datasets that are related to this Dataset, such as previous research on this subject.
relatedDatasets.title: Related Datasets

otherReferences.description: Any references that would serve as background or supporting material to this Dataset.
otherReferences.title: Other References

dataSources.description: List of books, articles, serials, or machine-readable data files that served as the sources of the data collection.
dataSources.title: Data Sources

originOfSources.description: For historical materials, information about the origin of the sources and the rules followed in establishing the sources should be specified.
originOfSources.title: Origin of Sources

characteristicOfSources.description: Assessment of characteristics and source material.
characteristicOfSources.title: Characteristic of Sources Noted

accessToSources.description: Level of documentation of the original sources.
accessToSources.title: Documentation and Access to Sources
